name: Baldi's basic in halloween party
description:
Welcome to the Baldi's halloween party. We have candies to give it to you but you need to pass my game first. The game is called run and collect. That's all I can say so have fun. The map that I use to make this is called "Baldi new schoolhouse 2" which is made by me. What's new in this one? -Jack o lantern are all over the place -Playtime has a new music box sound -New mus_Intro and mus_School (Hope it's not copyright for the youtuber.) 

 Note: I will fix the bug about the ambient light after the power outage event later.

Credits:

Paulor94 - Map and mod creator

mystman12 - Original creator of Baldi's basic

Chris Lee - The owner of "This is halloween instrumental" song

MisterchidsMachinima - The owner of "This is halloween" music box version
